talk.author: did:plc:jophkoe532q66wwiqh2hor7e
talk.utter:
Customization is not the problem. The biggest problem is people who decide which server to federate with. 

While the idea started with "we can efficiently disconnect servers full of right-winged people" it quickly devolved into "that server uses CloudFlare which is not FOSS so we block them".

talk.author: did:plc:jophkoe532q66wwiqh2hor7e
talk.utter: And other reasons normal people don't really care about but have to deal with the result their contacts are on the other side of the block.

talk.author: did:plc:dr6cavavqbbtzeknnl76tp54
talk.utter:
You're not using the word customizability like I am, just so you know.

Because what you're describing is close to what I mean but you seem to think it isn't.
